Our Activities

We regulary organize activities to combine work and pleasure and getting to know our coworkers.

Once a month, we all head out for a fun lunch. It's always a good time, and we get to hang out and chat outside of work.

Monthly Lunches

All levels welcome. It's not about running like crazy but about having a good time together, getting some fresh air, and exercise. These lunch runs are a great way to break up the workday and boost our mood.

Weekly Lunch Runs

Since we are next to the sea, we make it a weekly habit to go for a refreshing swim. Whether you're a seasoned swimmer or just starting out, join in on the fun!

Weekly Sea Swims

We are always open for new activities, new ideas.

Your Proposal ?

Our Happy Clients

Great place with friendly admosphere. The shower and the location makes place unique and very inviting to go for a quick swim, run, beach break during your hard working day

Kevin Haesendonck
Programmer

Lovely little co-working with loads of light, nice people, free coffee and fast wifi. Relaxed and calm place (we translators need to concentrate!) with a meeting room if you need a quiet area for calls. Super close to the beach so you can run, swim or play beach volley (and shower in the office after) or have a drink after work. Well equipped kitchen with a big fridge to warm up some lunch but also lots of food places nearby, even vegan. I've been working from here for nearly 10 months now and it made a big change, I get a lot more done and am glad to have "colleagues" again to chat or go for lunch with after 3 years of working from home.

Britta Willmes
Translator

Fantastic work space! It has everything it needs: a cosy yet spacious work space, good WiFi (tested in a lengthy zoom call!), an equipped kitchen and clean facilities! The cherry on top: a great location, just two minutes from the beach where you can take a walk during your break!

Melis Günay

I love it! It has the right size, not too big, nor too small, and offers active people like myself to go for a run and shower afterwards. The vibe fosters productivity and the coffee and Wi-Fi are great as well. Highly recommended!

Yohay Elam
Financial Analyst, Entrepreneur

Great little cowork space - brand new facilities, super clean and fresh. Plenty of space, and love that it's on the ground floor so easy access and sea breezes when the door is open! Great owner and friendly people around too.

Sarah Smelik

It is a very pleasant, quiet and bright space. Very good atmosphere, in a very central but quiet area next to Bogatell beach. So it is perfect for combining work with sport, air and sea water.

Inês de Lemos

I started working here a few months ago, everything was great, the atmosphere is very good and calm, the place is very cozy and the location is incredible.

Josep Estudis

Increíble co-working en Barcelona. Ambiente muy agradable y luminoso. Muy buena ubicación, a ras de una calle no muy transitada, lo cual asegura una vista despejada y hacia fuera con un máximo de tranquilidad. Las instalaciones son más que suficiente para trabajar cómodamente. Recomiendo 100%

Hajer ROUACHED

Great place in an unbeatable location. The host is very friendly and welcoming.

Xavi Longan
